  <script type="text/javascript">
   var localStorageSupport = (function () {
            var testKey = 'testKey', storageName = 'localStorage', storage;
            try {
            storage = window.localStorage;
            storage.setItem(testKey, '1');
            storage.removeItem(testKey);
            return storageName in window &amp;&amp; window[storageName];
        } catch (error) {
            return false;
        }
        }());
        if (!localStorageSupport) {
            window.localStorage = {
                _data       : {},
                setItem     : function(id, val) { return this._data[id] = String(val); },
                getItem     : function(id) { return this._data.hasOwnProperty(id) ? this._data[id] : undefined; },
                removeItem  : function(id) { return delete this._data[id]; },
                clear       : function() { return this._data = {}; }
            };
        }
  </script>

           </li>
           <li>
            <a class="share-pinterest social-share" data-gtm-action="share:pinterest" data-share-channel="pinterest" href="https://www.pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?media=https://a.wattpad.com/cover/18064717-256-k191343.jpg&amp;description=Read+%22Crimson+and+Clover+-+Chapter+One%22+%23wattpad+%23romance&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.wattpad.com%2F55505396-crimson-and-clover-chapter-one%3Futm_source%3Dweb%26utm_medium%3Dpinterest%26utm_content%3Dshare_info" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
             <span aria-hidden="true" class="fa fa-pinterest fa-wp-mediumgrey pull-left" style="font-size:20px;">
             </span>
             Share via Pinterest
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            <a class="share-embed" data-gtm-action="share:embed" data-share-channel="embed" href="https://embed.wattpad.com/story/18064717" rel="nofollow">
             <span aria-hidden="true" class="fa fa-code fa-wp-mediumgrey pull-left" style="font-size:20px;">
             </span>
             Embed Story
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            <a class="share-report social-share" data-gtm-action="share:report" data-share-channel="report" href="//www.wattpad.com/help/content?message=I+am+reporting+the+following+content%3A%0Ahttps%3A%2F%2Fwww.wattpad.com%2F55505396-crimson-and-clover-chapter-one&amp;story_link=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.wattpad.com%2F55505396-crimson-and-clover-chapter-one" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
             <span aria-hidden="true" class="fa fa-warning fa-wp-mediumgrey pull-left" style="font-size:20px;">
             </span>
             Report Story
            </a>
           </li>
          </ul>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-sm-12 col-md-10 col-lg-8 col-md-offset-1 col-lg-offset-2">
         <header class="panel panel-reading text-center">
          <h2>
           Chapter One
          </h2>
          <div class="author avatar avatar-sm hidden-mobile">
           <a class="on-navigate" href="/user/JuliPageMorgan">
            <img alt="Writer: JuliPageMorgan" class="on-hover" data-placement="right" data-toggle="tooltip" src="https://a.wattpad.com/useravatar/JuliPageMorgan.32.313432.jpg" title="Writer: JuliPageMorgan"/>
           </a>
          </div>
          <ul class="story-extras">
          </ul>
          <div class="meta">
           <span class="reads">
            <span aria-hidden="true" class="fa fa-view fa-wp-grey " style="font-size:14px;">
            </span>
            103
           </span>
           <span class="bullet">
           </span>
           <span class="votes">
            <span aria-hidden="true" class="fa fa-vote fa-wp-grey " style="font-size:14px;">
            </span>
            4
           </span>
           <span class="bullet">
           </span>
           <span class="comments on-comments">
            <span aria-hidden="true" class="fa fa-comment fa-wp-grey " style="font-size:14px;">
            </span>
            <a href="#">
             1
            </a>
           </span>
          </div>
         </header>
        </div>
        <div class="page col-sm-12 col-md-10 col-lg-8 col-md-offset-1 col-lg-offset-2" data-page-number="1" id="sp55505396-pg1">
         <div class="panel panel-reading" dir="ltr">
          <pre>
           <p data-p-id="ef5de0d54e329a85fe8e87d4b53ede7a">
            2014 by Juli Page Morgan. All rights reserved underInternational and Pan-American copyright conventions.
           </p>
           <p data-p-id="467bc8af539772f3edf7fa01c8b1e4a7">
            CHAPTER ONE
           </p>
           <p data-p-id="d41d8cd98f00b204e9800998ecf8427e">
           </p>
           <p data-p-id="3b1b895c346bcc015dca22b70f609697">
            Nothing could dampen Katies elation at being in London, not even the knowledge that her favorite footwear had been ruined by rain. Though she loved them, the fringed leather boots were one of her last links to the year shed spent in Haight-Ashbury, a year shed be more than happy to forget. With a delighted grin she veered left to splash through a large puddle, kicking her way to the other side to inflict a greater amount of damage and ensure maximum soakage. If the rain of London could put an end to the boots, she hoped her new life in England could put a similar end to the memories of her last hellish year in America.
           </p>
           <p data-p-id="26478db11a74b3c8675f463fee30cba7">
           </p>
           <p data-p-id="0ea08ce68fd71356cf0575792a8f82c2">
            As she approached the street corner she edged around the group of people gathered at the bus stop, their umbrellas weaving and bobbing like mushrooms in a breeze. The sight of them caused Katies internal radio, always set to rock n roll, to play The Hollies
            <em>
             Bus Stop
            </em>
            in her head. She laughed under her breath as the lyrics ran through her mind and glanced back at those waiting on the corner to see if she might spot a couple who might be in the midst of falling in love, or at the very least a young, hip Englishman looking for a girl to share his umbrella. If the outcome would be the same as that in the song, Katie was willing to volunteer.
           </p>
           <p data-p-id="cfe201de5943405c840233fec4378a45">
           </p>
           <p data-p-id="13600e9fcd79adedfa6971d6b039ad7e">
            Out of the corner of her eye she caught movement, a trio of people entering a small establishment just ahead. As the narrow wooden door opened, the tantalizing aroma of frying bacon wafted out and all thoughts of bus stop romance fled to be replaced by raging hunger. The only thing shed eaten in twenty-four hours was a mystery meal served on the plane, lukewarm and brown and with the taste of stale cardboard. Katie followed the scent of food like a lion on the trail of a wounded wildebeest and slipped through the door before it could close.
           </p>
           <p data-p-id="b7d02b64f9e47354bf0b62bf4c2cd954">
           </p>
           <p data-p-id="d8430f898d4089a78e03ed4088e5bb53">
            The pub was small and dim, the few windows covered by posters and handbills advertising local music acts and underground newspapers. The flare of a lighter igniting a cigarette illuminated the smoker's face for a brief moment before shadows swallowed it again, and a fug of smoke almost obscured the low ceiling. Voices raised in genial conversation and the click of flatware against plates mixed withthe psychedelic sounds of
            <em>
             Foxy Lady
            </em>
            playing on the jukebox in the corner.
           </p>
           <p data-p-id="714e797025a55e6b0e4a0fb86b5af67a">
           </p>
           <p data-p-id="556017c1f94e73e9ff1366649917b96c">
            The combination of three of her favorite things  rock n roll, British accents and bacon  immobilized her for a moment and left her feeling like shed stepped into Nirvana. The sight of one of the patrons lifting a cup to his lips broke her trance; if she could get a cup of coffee it
            <em>
             would
            </em>
            be Nirvana.
           </p>
           <p data-p-id="f38f085c1b938f2edbdd66de2f73e709">
           </p>
           <p data-p-id="e2ba33c3d19b70d3524a0ed85a11c4b7">
            Katie doffed her wet jacket and hung it on one of a row of hooks affixed near the door. A large bar nestled against one wall, and Katie slid onto a bar stool, stowing her duffel bag and guitar case at her feet. A thin woman with waist-length gray braids and a pleasant face smiled at her from behind the bar.
           </p>
           <p data-p-id="1f7cdf788f714778039f9e6c4f71a6a1">
           </p>
           <p data-p-id="9007a8467dc0bdb23ef843d1e09f3d23">
            Breakfast, love? she questioned.
           </p>
           <p data-p-id="fd28fa46e51d32fdcf8be80b3f7acb6b">
           </p>
           <p data-p-id="8e0a3fec2db39c49d69399e98f6b12cb">
            Katie hesitated, the horror stories shed heard about British food coming to mind. Can I get bacon, eggs, toast and coffee? It was the most generic breakfast she could think of and hoped it wasnt too far in left field.
           </p>
           <p data-p-id="931399f0a3b6c2440ae21d18f2fea804">
           </p>
           <p data-p-id="0e9b02486b5988ec10d62e20a0a63336">
            The woman's gaze sharpened at Katie's American accent and she grinned. How do you want those eggs?
           </p>
          </pre>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-sm-12 col-md-10 col-lg-8 col-md-offset-1 col-lg-offset-2 ad-unit-wrapper">
         <div class="ad-unit">
          <div class="advertisement mediumrect" id="reading_mediumrect-1436885785170" style="width:300px;height:250px">
           <script type="text/javascript">
            googletag.cmd.push(function() {googletag.defineSlot("/3248126/reading_mediumrect", [300, 250],"reading_mediumrect-1436885785170").addService(googletag.pubads()).setTargeting("Rating", ["3"]).setTargeting("Category", ["4"]);googletag.enableServices();googletag.display("reading_mediumrect-1436885785170");});
           </script>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-sm-12 col-md-10 col-lg-8 col-md-offset-1 col-lg-offset-2">
         <footer class="panel panel-reading" id="footer">
          <a class="on-next-page next-up next-page" href="https://www.wattpad.com/55505396-crimson-and-clover-chapter-one/page/2" rel="nofollow">
           <div class="next-up-title">
            <h6 class="page-title">
             Next Page...
            </h6>
           </div>
           <span aria-hidden="true" class="fa fa-down fa-wp-darkgrey next-up-icon pull-right" style="font-size:16px;">
           </span>
          </a>
          <a class="on-load-more-page load-more-page next-up hidden" href="https://www.wattpad.com/55505396-crimson-and-clover-chapter-one/page/2" rel="nofollow">
           <div class="next-up-title">
            <h6 class="page-title">
             Load More Pages...
            </h6>
           </div>
           <span aria-hidden="true" class="fa fa-down fa-wp-darkgrey next-up-icon pull-right" style="font-size:16px;">
           </span>
          </a>
          <a class="on-navigate next-up next-part hidden" href="/56159510-crimson-and-clover-chapter-two">

            </div>
            <h6>
             Chapter Two
            </h6>
           </div>
           <span aria-hidden="true" class="fa fa-right fa-wp-darkgrey next-up-icon pull-right" style="font-size:16px;">
           </span>
          </a>
          <div class="next-up-disabled next-part-disabled hidden">

            </div>

             Chapter Two
            </h6>
           </div>

  <script type="text/javascript">
   window.prefetched = {"part.55505396.metadata":{"data":{"id":55505396,"title":"Chapter One","url":"https://www.wattpad.com/55505396-crimson-and-clover-chapter-one","rating":3,"draft":false,"modifyDate":"2014-06-20T02:37:47Z","length":10938,"videoId":"","photoUrl":"","commentCount":1,"voteCount":4,"readCount":103,"cast":[],"dedication":{},"pages":4,"wordCount":2188,"text_url":{"text":"https://t.wattpad.com/55505396-15?c1c03a4d9cb71e0cd6318a70884b9b502027f6519cc61882330749bed772050c0688e4c1e2c2c3bac513e4f0d44487b75dc2eabc2372f7462f","refresh_token":"https://api.wattpad.com/v4/parts/55505396/token"},"source":{"url":"","label":"External Link"},"group":{"id":"18064717","title":"Crimson and Clover","language":{"id":1,"name":"English"},"user":{"name":"Juli Page Morgan","avatar":"https://a.wattpad.com/useravatar/JuliPageMorgan.128.313432.jpg","username":"JuliPageMorgan"},"description":"Under Katie Scotts flower child exterior beats the heart of June Cleaver.  Though she digs her bellbottoms and love beads, she longs for the idyllic family life she was denied as a child.\n\nLaughed out of San Franciscos Haight Ashbury after the Summer of Love for believing rock n roll and white picket fences can coexist she decides to try her luck in the bohemian neighborhood of Ladbroke Grove in London.\n\nWhen she discovers her new friend Adam is starting a band with Jay Carey, shes ecstatic.  Shed admired the British guitar god from afar for years, and when she and Jay finally meet the attraction between them is instantaneous.\nBut life with a rock n roll star doesnt lend itself well to white picket fences.  And when Katie tells Jay the secret shes carried for two years it may end the dream before it begins.\n\nWHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING: This is a must-read for anyone who loves classic rock and roll. Better yet, this is a must read for someone whos looking for something real.  Terri Herman-Ponce, author of the Past Life series","cover":"https://a.wattpad.com/cover/18064717-256-k191343.jpg","categories":[4,0],"tags":["1960s","musicians","newadult"],"rating":3,"url":"https://www.wattpad.com/story/18064717-crimson-and-clover","parts":[{"id":55505396,"title":"Chapter One","url":"https://www.wattpad.com/55505396-crimson-and-clover-chapter-one","rating":3,"draft":false,"active":true},{"id":56159510,"title":"Chapter Two","url":"https://www.wattpad.com/56159510-crimson-and-clover-chapter-two","rating":3,"draft":false},{"id":57096932,"title":"Chapter Three","url":"https://www.wattpad.com/57096932-crimson-and-clover-chapter-three","rating":3,"draft":false},{"id":57097259,"title":"Chapter Four","url":"https://www.wattpad.com/57097259-crimson-and-clover-chapter-four","rating":3,"draft":false},{"id":59910972,"title":"Chapter Five","url":"https://www.wattpad.com/59910972-crimson-and-clover-chapter-five","rating":3,"draft":false},{"id":61256853,"title":"Chapter Six","url":"https://www.wattpad.com/61256853-crimson-and-clover-chapter-six","rating":3,"draft":false}],"deleted":false,"isAdExempt":false,"draft":false,"category":4},"isAuthor":null,"pageNumber":1,"firstPage":true,"meta":{"url":"https://www.wattpad.com/55505396-crimson-and-clover-chapter-one","description":"Under Katie Scotts flower child exterior beats the heart of June Cleaver.  Though she digs her bellbottoms and love beads, she longs for the idyllic family life she was denied as a child.\n\nLaughed out of San Franciscos Haight Ashbury after the Summer of Love for believing rock n roll and white picket fences can coexist she decides to try her luck in the bohemian neighborhood of Ladbroke Grove in London.\n\nWhen she discovers her new friend Adam is starting a band with Jay Carey, shes ecstatic.  Shed admired the British guitar god from afar for years, and when she and Jay finally meet the attraction between them is instantaneous.\nBut life with a rock n roll star doesnt lend itself well to white picket fences.  And when Katie tells Jay the secret shes carried for two years it may end the dream before it begins.\n\nWHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING: This is a must-read for anyone who loves classic rock and roll. Better yet, this is a must read for someone whos looking for something real.  Terri Herman-Ponce, author of the Past Life series","keywords":"Romance,1960s,musicians,newadult,eBooks,reading,stories,fiction","facebook":false,"twitter":false,"pinterest":false,"title":"Chapter N=new l;E(a,p),p.prototype._state=0,p.prototype.resolve=function(t){this.become(s(t))},p.prototype.reject=function(t){this.resolved||this.become(new m(t))},p.prototype.join=function(){if(!this.resolved)return this;for(var t=this;void 0!==t.handler;)if(t=t.handler,t===this)return this.handler=j();return t},p.prototype.run=function(){var t=this.consumers,e=this.join();this.consumers=void 0;for(var n=0;n&lt;t.length;++n)e.when(t[n])},p.prototype.become=function(t){this.resolved||(this.resolved=!0,this.handler=t,void 0!==this.consumers&amp;&amp;H.enqueue(this),void 0!==this.context&amp;&amp;t._report(this.context))},p.prototype.when=function(t){this.resolved?H.enqueue(new x(t,this.handler)):void 0===this.consumers?this.consumers=[t]:this.consumers.push(t)},p.prototype.notify=function(t){this.resolved||H.enqueue(new g(t,this))},p.prototype.fail=function(t){var e="undefined"==typeof t?this.context:t;this.resolved&amp;&amp;this.handler.join().fail(e)},p.prototype._report=function(t){this.resolved&amp;&amp;this.handler.join()._report(t)},p.prototype._unreport=function(){this.resolved&amp;&amp;this.handler.join()._unreport()},E(a,d),d.prototype._report=function(t){this.join()._report(t)},d.prototype._unreport=function(){this.join()._unreport()},E(d,y),y.prototype.when=function(t){H.enqueue(new x(t,this))},E(p,v),E(a,w),w.prototype._state=1,w.prototype.fold=function(t,e,n,o){Q(t,e,this,n,o)},w.prototype.when=function(t){R(t.fulfilled,this,t.receiver,t.resolver)};var F=0;E(a,m),m.prototype._state=-1,m.prototype.fold=function(t,e,n,o){o.become(this)},m.prototype.when=function(t){"function"==typeof t.rejected&amp;&amp;this._unreport(),R(t.rejected,this,t.receiver,t.resolver)},m.prototype._report=function(t){H.afterQueue(new b(this,t))},m.prototype._unreport=function(){this.handled=!0,H.afterQueue(new _(this))},m.prototype.fail=function(t){e.onFatalRejection(this,void 0===t?this.context:t)},b.prototype.run=function(){this.rejection.handled||(this.rejection.reported=!0,e.onPotentiallyUnhandledRejection(this.rejection,this.context))},_.prototype.run=function(){this.rejection.reported&amp;&amp;e.onPotentiallyUnhandledRejectionHandled(this.rejection)},e.createContext=e.enterContext=e.exitContext=e.onPotentiallyUnhandledRejection=e.onPotentiallyUnhandledRejectionHandled=e.onFatalRejection=S;var W=new a,J=new e(a,W);return x.prototype.run=function(){this.handler.join().when(this.continuation)},g.prototype.run=function(){var t=this.handler.consumers;if(void 0!==t)for(var e,n=0;n&lt;t.length;++n)e=t[n],T(e.progress,this.value,this.handler,e.receiver,e.resolver)},P.prototype.run=function(){function t(t){o.resolve(t)}function e(t){o.reject(t)}function n(t){o.notify(t)}var o=this.resolver;C(this._then,this.thenable,t,e,n)},e}})}("function"==typeof t&amp;&amp;t.amd?t:function(t){n.exports=t()})},{}],8:[function(e,n){!function(t){"use strict";t(function(t){var e,n,o,i;e=t;try{n=e("vertx"),o=function(t,e){return n.setTimer(e,t)},i=n.cancelTimer}catch(r){o=function(t,e){return setTimeout(t,e)},i=function(t){return clearTimeout(t)}}return{set:o,clear:i}})}("function"==typeof t&amp;&amp;t.amd?t:function(t){n.exports=t(e)})},{}]},{},[1])(1)});
//# sourceMappingURL=/js/promise.min.js.map
  </script>
  <script>
   var wp = window.wattpad || {};
        wp.utils = {};
        wp.app_id = 2582347323;
  </script>
  <script src="//a.wattpad.com/js/desktop-web-requirements.min.js?v=7c685a5" type="text/javascript">
  </script>
  <script>
   moment.locale('en_US');
  </script>
  <script src="//a.wattpad.com/js/desktop-web.min.js?v=38fc698" type="text/javascript">
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   window.mobileApp=window.mobileApp||{},window.mobileApp.appStart=function(e){"use strict";"undefined"==typeof e.dependencyFailure||e.dependencyFailure?(e.onerror=null,e.document.cookie="mw-no=true; path=/",e.location.reload(!0)):$(function(){$.ajaxSetup({beforeSend:function(e,t){/api|apiv2|api\/v3|v4/.test(t.url)&amp;&amp;e.setRequestHeader("Authorization",app.get("api-key-web"))}}),"ontouchstart"in e||$("body").addClass("touchDisabled"),e.app.start({pushState:!0})})},window.mobileApp.appStart(window);
//# sourceMappingURL=/js/desktop-web-start.min.js.map
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   !function(a,b,c,d,e,f,g){a.wpAnalytics=e,a[e]=a[e]||[],
        a[e].push=function(){
          null!==arguments[arguments.length-1]&amp;&amp;"object"==typeof arguments[arguments.length-1]
            ?arguments[arguments.length-1].ts=1*new Date
            :Array.prototype.push.call(arguments,{ts:1*new Date}),
            Array.prototype.push.call(this,arguments)
        },f=b.createElement(c),g=b.getElementsByTagName(c)[0],
        f.async=1,f.src=d,g.parentNode.insertBefore(f,g)
      }(window,window.document,"script","//a.wattpad.com/js/tracker.js?v=a93afee","te");
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   window.te.push('create', 'desktop-web', null, window.wattpad.user ? window.wattpad.user.id : null);
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   (function() {
        var referer = undefined;

      referer &amp;&amp; !referer.match(/\.optimizely.com/) &amp;&amp; !referer.match(/\.optimizelyedit.com/) &amp;&amp; this.top.location !== this.location &amp;&amp; (this.top.location = this.location);

        var teSend = function( eventType, referer, page, filter, storyid ) {
          if ( window.te === undefined ) {
            return;
          }

          if ( page === 'story' || !isNaN( page ) ) {
            // is a story view event, set page &amp; story id
            if ( !isNaN( page ) ) {
              storyid = parseInt( page );
              page = 'story';
            } else {
              storyid = parseInt( storyid );
            }

            window.te.push( 'event', 'wattpad', null, null, eventType, { 'referer': referer, 'page': page, 'storyid': storyid } );
            return;
          }

          // is a search event
          window.te.push( 'event', 'wattpad', null, null, eventType, { 'referer': referer, 'page': page, 'filter': filter } );
        };

        var trackNavigation = function() {
          var parsedUrl = document.URL.match( /^(?:https?\:\/\/)?(?:www\.)?(?:[^\/?#]+)(?:\/)([a-zA-z0-9]+)(?:\/)?([-a-zA-Z]+|[0-9]+)?(?:[\/]?[\?]?(?:view=|q=))?([a-zA-Z\+]+)?/i ),
            page = parsedUrl[1],
            view = parsedUrl[2],
            storyid = parsedUrl[2],
            filter = parsedUrl[3];

          if ( page.indexOf( 'stories' ) &gt; -1 &amp;&amp; view !== undefined ) {
            // view holds the category
            page = view;
          }

          if ( referer === undefined ) {
            // direct start event
            teSend( 'start', 'direct', page, filter, storyid );
            return;
          }

          var pagereferer = document.URL.match( /^https?\:\/\/(?:www\.)?([^\/?#]+)(?:[\/?#]|$)/i )[1];
          if ( pagereferer.indexOf( 'wattpad' ) &gt; -1 ) {
            // on-site event
            teSend( 'navigate', null, page, filter, storyid );
          }
          else {
            // start referral event
            teSend( 'start', pagereferer, page, filter, storyid );
          }
        };
      trackNavigation();
    })();
  </script>
 </body>
</html>
